Package memposit.google.auth.exeption.handler

Class CustomizedExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
memposit.google.auth.exeption.handler.CustomizedExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class CustomizedExceptionHandler extends Object
This is Customized response entity class that handles the exception and returns the Error as per the format given in ErrorMessage
